output:
What weighs nothing but two sinkers? Shit, what's in the middle of a mince? What kind of hatred? What did you go away and leave me with? A hole in my heart, a hole in my heart
There's a half-bird, had one too, but he looked a fool And I love you and I don't know what I'm gonna do about this hole in my heart, this hole in my heart

This hole in my heart, this hole in my heart This hole in my heart, this hole in my heart
